## Installation

```{r setup, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("bevingtona/era5landDownloadTools")
```

## Prep example

```{r aoi, eval=FALSE}
aoi = mapedit::editMap()
name = "test"
``` 

## Download data

```{r download, eval=FALSE}
era5land_download <- era5land_download_monthly(
  aoi = aoi,
  aoi_name = name,
  years = 2021:2021,
  months = 5:8,
  variables = c('2m_temperature'),
  user = "",
  key = "",
  download_dir = ".") 
```

## Read GRIB 

```{r read, eval=FALSE}
era5land_stars <- era5land_read_monthly_stars(
  aoi_name = name,
  years = 2021:2021,
  months = 5:8,
  variables = c('2m_temperature'),
  download_dir = ".")

```
